headline: ServiceNow, Inc. (NOW) Releases Q2 Financial Results; Beats Expectations
summary: ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) secures a place on our list of the 12 Best Ethical Companies to Invest in 2025. On July 23, 2025, ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) reported financial results for Q2, beating guidance across all areas. The company reported subscription revenues of $3.11 billion, a 22.5% YoY growth, while its total revenues reached $3.22 billion, […]
